title: Premier League sets spending record in Summer 2025 transfer window
summary: The summer of 2025 witnessed a record-breaking transfer window with huge spending across Premier League clubs, including major signings by Liverpool.

title: Fixture changes due to European competitions
summary: The Premier League announced amendments to several fixtures in Matchweeks 5, 6, 7, and 9 to accommodate clubs competing in European tournaments.

title: Daniel Levy steps down as Tottenham chairman after 25 years
summary: Daniel Levy has stepped down as chairman of Tottenham Hotspur after 25 years, with reports widely covered by major outlets.

title: Liverpool sign Alexander Isak on deadline day
summary: On transfer deadline day, Liverpool secured major signings, with Alexander Isak being one of the most notable deals reported.
